bounties.title: Weekly Research: AI-Powered Development Ecosystems - The Rise of Agentic Workflows, MCP Integration, and the Evolution of Copilot
bounties.body:
# Weekly Research: AI-Powered Development Ecosystems - The Rise of Agentic Workflows, MCP Integration, and the Evolution of Copilot

**Research Date:** October 7, 2025  
**Repository:** DevExpGbb/vscode-ghcp-starter-kit

---

## Executive Summary

The vscode-ghcp-starter-kit repository sits at the intersection of three converging trends: the maturation of GitHub Copilot into an autonomous agent, the explosive growth of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) ecosystem, and the industry-wide shift towar...
bounties.author: github-actions[bot]
